metadata.description: Run Nmap with selectable scan profiles

findings.title: No open ports detected
findings.description: Nmap did not detect open ports.

raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nmaprun>

<nmaprun scanner="nmap" args="nmap -T3 -Pn -sC -sV -p- -oX - example.com" start="1764235578" startstr="Thu Nov 27 14:56:18 2025" version="7.98" xmloutputversion="1.05">
<scaninfo type="connect" protocol="tcp" numservices="65535" services="1-65535"/>
<verbose level="0"/>
<debugging level="0"/>
<runstats><finished time="1764235583" timestr="Thu Nov 27 14:56:23 2025" summary="Nmap done at Thu Nov 27 14:56:23 2025; 0 IP addresses (0 hosts up) scanned in 5.15 seconds" elapsed="5.15" exit="success"/><hosts up="0" down="0" total="0"/>
</runstats>
</nmaprun>
